Until, two weekends ago, my wife’s friend came over and they were in the kitchen which is open to the living room where I was, talking about taking the friends daught shopping for a prom dress. My wife says “I still have my prom dress, let me get it and show it to you.” She returned with the dress and she showed it to her friend and her friend made a comment “oh, no, it has spots on it” and my wife says “oh, yeah, my date wade a mess! I said “hey, I don’t feel comfortable with another guy’s cumstains in your closet on that dress, have it dry cleaned” she said “what! You never cared before!
